file_content.text: Your Republic will not save you, Jedi. It is a cradle of corruption. I never understood how you could serve politicians.
I defend peace and justice. Protect the innocent from harm.
I serve the people.
And they squander your sacrifice. Why continue to help? What do you hope to achieve?
It's never been about me.
Perhaps it should be.
You Jedi cultivate detachment, and yet you lay down your lives to preserve this place.
The knowledge and cultures of a thousand worlds gather here. They're well worth defending.
I protect many civilizations.
They would not return that favor. The Republic shunned your Order after the Sacking of Coruscant.
People were afraid, but things changed.
They will change again. That is the way of things.
You spent your life taking orders from cowardly politicians. Such a waste.
I protect free worlds from scum like you. No regrets about that.
I defend the Republic.
Your Republic is an empty ideal. Its people cannot appreciate your service.
I don't fight for a parade.
You deserve better than empty gestures.
You made your fortune in this corrupt Republic. But money cannot save you now.
You're forgetting all my friends in high places. They'll get me out of this.
I have connections, too.
Saresh and her cowards? To them you are a crude implement, easily cast aside.
Now you're just being hurtful.
Pain brings clarity. Embrace it, Captain.
Stop following me.
I offer help. You seek shelter you do not need.
I didn't choose to come here. You brought me. Why?
You're controlling this dream.
You control more than you think. I follow your lead.
There is greatness in you that cannot be denied. You are a far superior leader to any Chancellor.
I won't bother explaining democracy to a Sith.
This isn't a dictatorship.
I am no Sith. And democracy is overrated.
I'm not one of your Sith. You can't tempt me with power.
Power doesn't interest Jedi.
You have all the power you require. What you lack is focus.
My place is on the front lines, not behind some desk.
Politics don't interest me.
Every soldier needs a cause worth fighting for.
You applying to be my campaign manager?
You want me to run for office?
A new order must replace this one. Why not yours?
If I controlled the Republic, we wouldn't be having this conversation. You'd be dead.
I should be in charge.
Perhaps. But we share a vision of how things could be.
This Republic is not worth saving any more than my Empire. We have a greater purpose.
To take back your Eternal Throne?
You mean Zakuul?
If you think we're joining forces, you're insane.
There is no "we".
Am I?
I'm loyal to the Republic. Nothing you show me will change that.
The Republic is worth saving.
You refuse to see the truth. It will cost you.
You failed to defend their home. They will not forgive you.
I only fail when fear controls me.
This is a test of my Code.
Right or wrong, I'm not firing on my own people.
I won't battle civilians.
I take the fall for your kid's temper tantrum. Figures.
Just my luck.
Don't come any closer!
Get back, people!
They will not listen. They want you dead.
I'm not afraid of them. It's just a bad dream.
None of this is happening.
But the carbonite poisoning is quite real.
Republic... Empire... The Eternal Throne conquers all. You cannot stop it. Save yourself.
Our failed Empire. You were always superior to the murderous fools in charge here.
I enjoy ending their lives when they fail.
Destroying them pleases me.
You could be more than an executioner. You could rule.
And spend my days fighting those who would steal my rightful place.
You understand what is required. There is nothing to fear.
They underestimate me. That will be their downfall.
Someday they'll all be dead.
You sat on the Dark Council, but you never belonged with petty tyrants.
I climbed out of your slave pits to the top of the Empire. I rather like the view.
We must broaden your horizons.
A fact I remind them of every chance I get.
And they all know it.
A mind--a will--like yours should not remain in the shadows. Your name should be exalted.
It's known and feared by the right people.
To inspire fear is useful. To inspire hope... that is true power.
My failed Empire. You never belonged here, clawing through filth for murderous bureaucrats.
It paid the bills. Sometimes I even had fun.
It wasn't all bad.
It wasted your talents. There is more to life--to you--than credits and contracts.
Yeah--reputation. Even your Sith fear my name.
As they should. The Force has no power over you.
This Empire failed because of you. Someone like me could lead it to victory.
I could make the Empire great.
Do not waste time following the path of Marr and Malgus. There is no redemption here.
What's the point of wallowing in your biggest failure?
Then why are we here?
To prove a point.
The Dark Council... Imperial Intelligence... Mandalorians... all fail. You alone find victory.
I'm trapped in carbonite, dying of poison, and talking to you. This doesn't feel like winning.
But now I'm imprisoned.
A worm enters a chrysalis to grow wings. It never crawls again--and never looks back.
My destiny is unfulfilled.
Victory won't be mine until the last Jedi falls at my feet.
The Jedi Order is not your concern. Leave their defeat to another.
I won't be satisfied until the Empire is under my complete control.
Old ambitions will not sate your appetite.
The hunt never ends. There's always a bigger score.
Then chase something worthy of you.
I've only begun to spin my web of influence.
To trap whom?
I'll feel better when you're gone for good.
Not while you're still alive.
I am not your enemy. I will help you see.
This Empire is not worth saving, and the Republic is not worth destroying. There is a greater purpose awaiting us.
You want to take back your Eternal Throne.
You mean Zakuul.
I don't need allies. Especially cagey beasts like you.
We're not allies.
Is that so?
The Empire is stronger than you think. I won't abandon my home.
The Empire is worth saving.
Do not let sentiment cloud reality.
They want someone to blame for their defeat. They choose you.
Your inbred children will never conquer Dromund Kaas.
The Empire won't be defeated.
I won't waste my strength fighting things that aren't real.
Dreams don't frighten me.
These are not illusions.
Let them come. It's their funeral.
If they want to die, fine.
Theirs or yours. Only you can decide that. Choose quickly.
Empire... Republic... Both fall before the Eternal Throne. You cannot stop what is to come. Save yourself.
You're slow on the uptake. I'll spell it out for you: Leave. Me. Alone.
Stand aside. I will not be swayed from my path.
Then let's join forces like we planned on Zakuul.
I know.
First, you must survive.
I already agreed to join you.
I'm listening.
I have not forgotten.
